you can configure to enable to disbale to show abstract classes in the breadcrumbs

enable or disable abstract states in the breadcrumb view by adding abstract directive to the breadcrumb element

  const config = breadcrumbProvider => {
    breadcrumbProvider.configure({
      abstract: true
    });
  };
  
  config.$inject = ['breadcrumbProvider'];

  const app = angular.module('app', ['uiBreadcrumbs'])
  app.config(config)

This is the final page
